data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Tinsukia, Assam, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tinsukia, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Tinsukia.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Tinsukia, Assam, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Tinsukia.
Father, let the threatened of Tinsukia, Assam, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Darjee people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Darjee people know you.
Spirit, defend the church in the county of Tinsukia against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: There are 1,327,900 people living in the county of Tinsukia. Only about 14,607 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the county of Tinsukia, Assam, India has a population of 1,327,900.

We estimate Tinsukia has 14,607 people who might know Jesus, 16,112 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,297,181 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Tinsukia, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
